name: JumperPro
description:
This game is currently in Alpha Testing so is not finished and will contain many many bugs, some bugs are intentional. Be aware this is a Rage Parkour game, if you get so annoyed that you feel like breaking something then quit the game and try again later.

This game is a cross between getting over it and the floor is lava.

Your mission is to escape the factory of Evil Dr Bert and blow it up. However to safely escape you must master jumps over lava and hide from the spying eyes of Dr Bert's robot minions. Did I mention that Dr Bert experiments with lasers!? Luckily for you the other rebel, Clarris, is there to help! She worked on a secret project for teleportation and extra lives, with her help you are an unstoppable team!

Ready to defeat Dr. Bert?

(As the game is still in development the story line is not complete and could change at any stage of development)
